T02anitysuu:5: 2. tatra khalu bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
T02anitysuu:6: anityatā bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃskārā adhruvā anāsvāsikā vipariṇāmadharmānaḥ /
T02anitysuu:7: yad yāvad bhikṣavaḥ sarvebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyo 'laṃ nirvetum alaṃ viraktum alaṃ vimoktuṃ //
T02anitysuu:8: 3. sarveṣām sattvānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prāṇinām āmaraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitaṃ maraṇaparyavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ //
T02anitysuu:9: 4. ye 'pi te bhikṣavo gṛhapatayo mahāsālakulā brāhmaṇamahāsālakulā kṣatriyo mahāsālakulā āsāṃ mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ prabhūtamaṇimā
T02anitysuu:11: teṣām api maraṇāntaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaparyavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ //
T02anitysuu:12: 5. ye 'pi te bhikṣavaḥ rājānaḥ kṣatriyāś ca mūrdhnābhiṣiktā
T02anitysuu:14: abhinirjityāvasanti, teṣām api maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitaṃ maraṇaparyavasānaṃ
T02anitysuu:17: ye 'pi te bhikṣava ṛṣayo vānaprasthāḥ pramuktaphalāhārāḥ pramuktaphalabhojinaḥ pramuktaphalena yāpanti, teṣām api maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitaṃ maraṇaparyavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ //
T02anitysuu:18: 7. ye 'pi te bhikṣavaḥ kāmāvacarā devāś cāturmahārājikā devās trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
T02anitysuu:19: devās, teṣām api maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitaṃ maraṇaparyavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ //
T02anitysuu:20: 8. ye 'pi te bhikṣavo rūpino devāḥ, prathamadhyānalābhino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇā, dvitīyadhyānalābhinaḥ parittaśubhā apramāṇaśubhā ābhāsvarās, tṛtīyadhyānalābhinaḥ parittaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnāś, caturthadhyānalābhino
T02anitysuu:21: 'nabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā vṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvā avṛhā (As 33) atapāḥ sudarśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devās, teṣām api maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitaṃ maraṇaparyavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ //
T02anitysuu:22: 9. ye 'pi te bhikṣavo 'rūpino devā ākāśānantyāyatanopagā vijñānānantyāyatanopagā ākiṃcityāyatanopagā
T02anitysuu:23: ca devāś ca, teṣām api maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitaṃ maraṇaparyavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ /
T02anitysuu:25: 10. ye 'pi te bhikṣavo 'rhantaḥ kṣīṇāśravā kṛtakṛtyāḥ kṛtakaraṇīyā
T02anitysuu:26: apahṛtabhārā anuprāptasvakārthāḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanāḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittāḥ sarvacetovasiparamapāramitāprāptās, teṣām api kāyā nikṣepaṇadharmāḥ //
T02anitysuu:27: 11. ye 'pi te bhikṣavaḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpā ekam ātmānaṃ
T02anitysuu:28: damanti ekam ātmānaṃ śamayanti ekam ātmānaṃ parinirvāpayanti, teṣām apy ayaṃ kāyo nikṣepaṇadharmaḥ
T02anitysuu:29: 12. ye 'pi te bhikṣavas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā daśabalabalinaḥ
T02anitysuu:32: viśadādṛḍhanārāyaṇasaṃhatakāyās, (As 34) teṣām apy ayam kāyo nikṣepaṇadharmaḥ //
T02anitysuu:33: 13. tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ kumbhākārakṛtāni bhāṇḍā āmāni vā pakvāni vā

T02anitysuu:36: 14. idam avocad bhagavān, idam uktvā sugato hy athāparāvocat śāstā /
